title: Tabistar
description: A Next.js web application for finding restaurants, cafes, and events in the Hamptons, New York. Users can check dynamic menus and other information on restaurants, cafes, and other establishments.

title: NegiNeko_Tokyo
description: Custom-built app for remote connection to control overlay for IRL streamers. Streamers could assign moderaters to help manage and update overlays to through websockets, and changes would reflect in real-time.

title: Moxie
description: A market place that allows sellers to split up the price of items that they are selling. Buyers would purchase tickets and when all the tickets are bought, a seller is randomly chosen to win the item.

title: Windward_CM
description: A static website built with Next.js with custom built GSAP animations.

description: Custom build wordpress website with custom GSAP animations

title: The_Hampton_Maid
description: Custom design/build of a landing page for R.AIRE on Wix
